Quick search

MySocket module¶

class MySocket.MySocket[source]¶

Bases: object

Base class for my socket objects, TCPSocket and UDPSocket. Adds ability to be used as an iterable. (implements __enter__, __exit__, __iter__, and __next__)

close()[source]¶

A method that closes the socket. Waits until data is not being sent.

receive()[source]¶

Overloaded by TCPSocket and UDPSocket

send(msg)[source]¶

Overloaded by TCPSocket and UDPSocket
